about_the_game:
Sink your teeth into these additional in-game items:

  • Amara - Vanguard Hero
    Amara, callsign Dagger Lead, has dedicated her life to hunting down the Infernals who took everything from her. She's laser-focused on the job at hand--killing demons--and she's damn good at what she does.
  • Maloc - Infernal Hero
    Maloc is an Infernal Commander who uses his fiery magic to devastating effect. A loyal and relentless soldier, he began at the bottom of the Infernal ranks and fought his way to the top, earning a fearsome reputation and the title Champion of the Host.
  • Auralanna - Celestial Hero
    Auralanna is the Sovereign of the Mythia City-State. She's a champion of truth and knowledge and a fierce defender of those in need. Don't mistake her gentle spirit for weakness.
  • Vanguard Campaign - Chapter 1 Missions
    Follow up the free prologue missions with the start of the Vanguard Campaign. Chapter 1 includes three story-driven campaign missions that can be played solo. In the future, you'll also be able to play these missions cooperatively with friends.
    Bonus: Unlock the Fuzzy Moth pet by completing Vanguard Mission 6 on Brutal difficulty.
    The free Prologue missions are Vanguard 1-3; Chapter 1 includes Vanguard Missions 4-6.
  • Gold Vanguard Army Accent
    Add a little extra bling to your Vanguard uniforms with this special golden accent.
  • Chicken Supporter Pet
    Welcoming this feisty feathered pal to your base is a great way to show your support for the Frost Giant team!

IMPORTANT: The Early Access Pack grants you access to Stormgate during the July 30-August 12 Preview period. It also unlocks level progression for any included Heroes.

Please note that Campaign Chapters 2 and 3 will not be available during the initial Early Access release and will be released later during Early Access. As with Chapter 1, Frost Giant Studios intends to update and polish each Campaign mission throughout the Early Access period.

Please read our FAQ for DLC Refund Policy.

short_description: Stormgate is a next-gen RTS set in a new science fantasy universe. Command mechs to defend the Earth or invade it as one of two other invading alien factions. Explore an ever-evolving campaign, group up for 3P co-op vs. AI, or compete in 1v1.
